Title: Ukraine’s Naftogaz secures new financing to boost gas imports ahead of winter
Description: Ukraine’s Naftogaz Group has secured EUR 410 million in new financing to accelerate gas imports and strengthen energy security ahead of the next heating season.
Author: CK

Title: Ravenna FSRU LNG terminal to begin commercial operations in early May
Description: The Snam-operated 3.9 mtpa Ravenna floating LNG terminal in Italy is poised to begin commercial operations in early May, following the completion of the BW Singapore floating storage regasification unit’s commissioning phase.
Author: CK

Title: Another US LNG tanker signals China discharge, but diversion also expected amid trade tensions
Description: Another LNG tanker carrying a US cargo is signaling discharge at PipeChina’s 6 mtpa Tianjin LNG terminal, but market expectations suggest it will divert to another destination due to the ongoing trade dispute between China and the US and China’s high tariffs on US LNG imports.
Author: CK

Title: Partial Idku LNG cargo heads to South Korea amid domestic gas strain
Description: A recently exported partial cargo from Egypt’s 7.2 mtpa Idku LNG plant—its first in nearly a year—is en route to South Korea’s Incheon LNG terminal, marking a rare shipment even as the country continues to grapple with falling gas production and strong domestic demand that has triggered a return to LNG imports since April last year.
Author: CK

Title: British Achiever partially loads second Greater Tortue Ahmeyim LNG cargo, awaits next loading
Description: The BP-led 2.5 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG project offshore Mauritania and Senegal has taken a step toward exporting its second cargo, with the British Achiever LNG tanker recently completing the partial loading of a cargo.
Author: CK

Title: Morocco seeks expressions of interest for LNG terminal, pipelines, and gas-fired power plant
Description: Morocco is taking a significant step toward becoming an LNG importer with a call for expressions of interest from developers for a major gas infrastructure project, which includes an LNG import terminal, pipelines, and a 1,200 MW gas-fired power plant. The Ministry of Energy Transition and Sustainable Development is accepting submissions until Jul. 23.
Author: CK
